name: A Wilbert Man (demo)
description:
You're late for work. Turn the lights on and get started.

WASD to move, mouse to look, left click to interact

Made for Game in a Week Jam # 2 - Theme: Everyone is dead

Mostly an experiment to work on my voxels and test some interaction methods.

The game is fairly incomplete and rough around the edges, may or may not continue in some form or another. There's not much of an ending, just a hole.

Likely some bugs left unsquashed. Full screen may bring some issues in webGL. Please let me know what you think!
